dialog_lines.line: Welcome to Gullmore Crossing! We appreciate the fur delivery from Shrimpsburg.
I heard you're a capable captain, can I interest you in some work? We need someone to transport funds back home to Turtleton.
I thought someone's ship was getting work done. It looks bigger!
If you're shorthanded, ask around, there are always dock workers looking for an adventure.
The additional crew can help fend off any pirates roving the trade route. Nothing a brave captain like you can't handle.
Also, this area is known for its booming seagull population... so if you look up, keep your mouth closed.
I'll get the funds brought out for your crew to load up before you leave. Good luck!
